Room.Name: Temple of the Rising Moon Foyer
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the entryway foyer of the Temple of the Rising Moon.
Room.LongDescription: The Temple of the Rising Moon is a shrine dedicated towards the Human Greek Goddess Artemis, known primarily for patronizing the hunter and the act of hunting. Artemitis is the sister twin of Apollo and daugther of Zeus and Leto. She is almost always associated with the full moon. Hunters and adventurers often come here to pray before heading out of the city to the unknown.
